q: partner at the judging table, the reliably effusive and ditzy Paula Abdul , who had departed the previous season. And Mr. Simon Cowell made little secret that he was bored and ready to get on to his next series, The X Factor,`` already a hit in Britain and scheduled to launch stateside this fall. Ellen DeGeneres , Ms. Paula Abdul 's replacement, never jelled with the other judges, including singer Kara DioGuardi , who had been brought on for the 2009 season to bolster the show in advance of Ms. Paula Abdul 's expected departure. Now Ms. Ellen DeGeneres and Ms. Kara DioGuardi are both gone. The saga of the`` American Idol phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series`` Pop Idol'' right up to Mr. Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy`` American Idol: The Untold Story

Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., wrote to Secretary of State Hillary Clinton urging the administration to veto the move and make it clear to the Palestinian Authority that it needs to sit down in direct talks with Israel, rather than pursue unhelpful resolutions at the United Nations. In the West Bank, chief Palestinian negotiator Saeb Erekat said that the Palestinians and their backers have agreed on the wording for the anti-settlement resolution. He said he expects it to be submitted to the Security Council

ik hebben een hoop gesproken over hoe de we management structuur eenvoudiger kunnen maken en beslissingen kunnen versnellen. Afgelopen kerst hebben we besloten dat dit het beste moment is om structurele veranderingen aan te brengen.'' De afgelopen 10 jaar hebben we allemaal een rol gehad bij het nemen van besluiten. Deze trojka heeft grote voordelen vanwege de gezamenlijke kennis, en we zullen belangrijke besluiten daarom ook gedrie?n blijven bespreken. Maar we zijn het ook er ook over eens dat we onze individuele rollen duidelijker moeten afbakenen en dat er een duidelijke verantwoordelijkheid en aansprakelijkheid nodig is aan de top van het bedrijf. Beurskoers stijgt Google maakte de wisseling na sluiting van de beurs bekend. In de nabeurshandel steeg het aandeel met 2 procent. Steve Ballmer also announced that the company's senior server and tools buisness veep Amitabh Srivastava was leaving Microsoft, but he didn't reveal why. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. Auch Google-Chef Eric Schmidt will die Augen vor der Wirklichkeit nicht verschlie?en: Ja, es gibt erhebliche Schwierigkeiten auf dem Immobilienmarkt und mit der Arbeitslosigkeit. Aber wenigstens Eric Schmidt hat dem sprichw?rtlichen Optimismus der Amerikaner noch nicht abgeschworen:`` Die Menschen werden einen Weg aus der Krise finden, der letztlich f?r jedermann funktionieren wird'', ist er berzeugt. the morning are the early peeks in The New York Times at former Defense Secretary Donald Rumsfeld 's memoir, which goes on sale next week. A few highlights from the Post's report: Donald Rumsfeld goes so far as to depict former George W. Bush as presiding over a national security process that was marked by incoherent decision-making and policy drift, most damagingly on the war in Iraq. `` Donald Rumsfeld remains largely unapologetic about his overall handling of the Iraq conflict and concludes that the war has been worth the costs. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
